thread.section_title: Richmond Opera Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good choice
thread.title_full: Good choice - Review of Richmond Opera Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Terhi K
title: Good choice
text: Hotel is good value for money with great location. Metro and RoissyBus are close, so it is easy to get here. Staff is helpful and friendly. Breakfast is more than ok. Bathrooms are great with lots of hot running water. The Hotel has a wonderful old Parisian feel to it. I would recommend this hotel and also choose it again for my next trip to Paris.
